title: Sound of sunshine, sound of rain
brief_description: A sensitive and animated depiction of a day in the life of a blind negro boy. Reveals the difficulties he encountered and the means by which he interprets the world around him. An excellent film for discussion purposes. Based on the book: Sound of sunshine, sound of rain by Florence Parry Heide.
